Photo Exhibition | NEH Grant Project

See the Pen GSAP | Putting it All Together by Melissa Evans (@mogo68) on CodePen.

PROJECT DESCRIPTION
For this Nation Endowment for the Humanities grant, I collaborated with the Director of Experiential Learning and students at Putnam County High School to create an online photo exhibition. Above is a prototype and template for the final product.
